response.overview: Greater Tuna presents a day in the life of the town of Tuna, Texas and its twenty or so eccentric characters. Here's the kicker: All of those characters -- who range the gamut from adolescent to elderly, male and female, with all kinds of personalities and personal characteristics -- are portrayed by only two men (ably played by Kyle McClaran and Landon Starnes in Garland Civic Theatre's entertaining production). - by Richard Goulde
response.tagline: The comedy about Texas' third smallest town... where the Lion's Club is too liberal and Patsy Cline never dies!
response.title: Greater Tuna

cast.name: Joe Sears
cast.character: Thurston Wheelis, Elmer Watkins, Bertha Bumiller, Leonard Childers, Aunt Pearl Burras, R.R. Snavely, The Reverend Spikes, Sheriff Givens, Hank Bumiller, Yippy

cast.name: Jaston Williams
